mods.description:
Adds a new character: The Pilot.
Themed around not being able to draw cards and playing from the top of the deck.

All art is made by me using The Hermit and Vanilla as a base or reference, No AI was used in the process.

Warning: Tried my best for compatibility with other mods but this character cards don't work well with other characters and vice versa because of how differently the character plays.
